column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of Ca3Mn2O7 were prepared by\rsolid state reaction of mixed stoichiometric quantities of\rCaCO3 (99.0%; Sigma-Aldrich) and MnO2 (99.99%; Sigma-\rAldrich).
#Text=The mixture was calcinated for 3 h at 1123 K in air.
#Text=Three more grinding and subsequent 12-h 1648 K annealing\rsteps were performed.

#Text=Single phase purity was confirmed\rby Le Bail refinement on the x-ray powder diffraction data\rcollected with a Rigaku smartlLab diffractometer and analyzed\rwith the FULLPROF software package [15].
#Text=The extracted\rstructural parameters are presented in Appendix A.
